website_summaries.verdict: This modern take on the iconic Air Max silhouette is is enough reason for ardent fans to consider buying the Nike Air Max Prime. With its superb air cushioning technology, this sneaker does not disappoint fans of this popular line as it promises topnotch comfort with modern touches to this highly successful silhouette. Also, it matches well with a variety of outfits.
pros: Many reviewers agree that the Nike Air Max Prime is extremely comfortable because of its lightweight foam midsole
It provides excellent air cushioning at the heel and the bottom that is appreciated by plenty of reviewers
A few commenters have noted that the waffle outsole holds well over various surfaces
This kind of Nike sneakers provides durability, according to several online reviewers
A good number of reviewers have claimed the mesh and leather material for the upper provides foot breathability
The Nike Air Max Prime has a cleatie construction that provides ankle support, several users have appreciated it
cons: A few commenters have noted that the Nike Air Max Prime is a little bit narrow
Neoprene-like material at the shoe collar could have been stretchier for easy entry in and exit

customer_reviews.title: Shoes great! Seller..not so much
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are awesome. Third pair(different colors) I’ve bought because they’re that great! Fit, feel is like a sock and I love it! Problem is , the seller just seems to pass around the same shoe that’s been returned. I ended up with the same yellowish, un-matching , discolored shoe that another reviewer had written about. Instead of the seller taking it out of circulation to fix the problem, they just keep selling it to somebody who eventually doesn’t want to go through the hassle of returning it and buying a new pair . Not cool! .. it’s yellow, pic doesn’t do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable Nike's I've owned to date. I really like how the top part of the shoe hugs my foot. Very supportive all around. Originally saw these shoes at Finish Line, but they weren't able to order my size. Was happy i could find these online.
customer_reviews.author: Abdu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for street running and they are amazing!!! I love them! Very comfortable and have good ankle support. I run almost everyday and my old shoes made my feet hurt (my old shoes needed replacing lol) since I’ve had these, no foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Had to cancel this order.
customer_reviews.text: I had to cancel this order, my touch pad is so sensitive my thumb hit the quick purchase while browsing. I really can't give an opinion on them.
customer_reviews.author: De Oppresso Liber

customer_reviews.title: dissapointing - buy something else
customer_reviews.text: These embody the worst running shoes I have ever owned. They have no tongue, and so prove difficult to put on your feet. They lack a wide size and make my feet numb. Finally, they seem to attract dirt and look soiled when wearing them. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES F WIEMEYER

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Last my son a whole school yr and the summer will last longer with a good cleaning no holes or tears.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Nike Airmax Prime
customer_reviews.text: extremely comfortable and provides cushioning for one's feet. Much superior to Acics or Sketchers. The only way to fly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G. Shibley

customer_reviews.title: Thanks so much
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much got it yesterday right before my husband’s birthday I cannot wait
customer_reviews.author: Lyric Damali

customer_reviews.title: Cool to own
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers .... fit well, as expected frim a Nike product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was excellent. I give this product 10 star. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Christopher Senne

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, larger looking in real life than photo. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: jordan herrera

customer_reviews.title: I Received Used Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had been worn and they smelled like feet inside. Returning them ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Armando M.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes breaking down too fast
customer_reviews.text: The front and sides of one of the shoes are coming apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: greg pierce

customer_reviews.title: My son is a Nike Air freak he has them ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Nike Air freak he has them all - I bought him these because he cleaned out all my flower beds and bagged it all!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R. Monzingo

customer_reviews.title: DOPE KICKS
customer_reviews.text: AS USUAL NIKE ROCKS! AND AMAZON WAS VERY SPEEDY ON DELIVERY!
customer_reviews.author: BudWizer500

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: They look amazing and this is the cheapest price I could find as well. I got this in only 3 days which was much faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely Not What I Expected. Shoes are really tight because of the sock liner didn't think they would fit until I pushed my foot inside. Next there are some reviews about the shoe being, "The most comfortable shoe they've ever worn." That has to be lies because my foot hurt for the 20 minutes I could handle. Also this shoe is a mix of the huarache and air max and they had a baby. Not going to lie they don't look super cool to me more like older men shoes. Only reason I might keep them is because of the price. Wouldn't recommend to people with wide foot unless you get a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Confortable but sole is starting to rip off after 4 months of use, I wear them for work(restaurant)
customer_reviews.author: michelangelo

customer_reviews.title: The fit was great and he says they're very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them. The fit was great and he says they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable im probably gonna order another pair

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size and different than the picture
customer_reviews.text: They look different in person than the picture and we’re not the right size

customer_reviews.title: my son love them, thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: It was right on time ,my son love them, thank you so much.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Services
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal all the way around....... Thanks Amazon😍😍💓👍👍

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Max Prime Gymnastics Shoes
product_meta.description: The Air Max Prime shoe is incredibly light, and is equipped the Max Air cushioning system which ensures excellent impact protection. Rubber Waffle sole offers grip and endurance. Synthetic upper offers a long-lasting support and comfort and a full-length foam midsole with light cushioning and maximum stability.
